messages.title: It’s time for a clean up
messages.content: Cleaning up Westminster will be a top priority for Madeleine Kirk if she becomes our local MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritize cleaning up Westminster; upset about duck houses and moats paid for by Labour and Conservative MPs.
Proven record of local action for York and a commitment to local representation.
Support for Nick Clegg’s Liberal Democrats' policy to invest £2.5 billion into schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lib Dems fight for Britain’s Armed Forces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to give a fair deal to the Armed Forces and to provide the equipment needed.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Labour and Conservative MPs
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can’t win in York Outer. Voting Labour can’t change anything here. It's a choice between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: Almost twenty years' proud service to the people of York as a local councillor.

politicalExperience.achievements: Serving and dedicating to the people of York including various local committees, Parish Councils, and as a School Governor.

endorsements.endorsement: Expressed protest at the lack of treatment, care, and resources for front-line troops fighting in Afghanistan.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Madeleine has lived and worked locally over thirty years, raising two children here. She has fought and won real victories for local people including saving precious greenbelt land from development and campaigning to protect our local NHS services.
